"Sara":
"There's Darkers somewhere like this?!
And their entrance was pretty showy to boot!"

"We mustn't trouble the Dragonkin any further.
We have to defeat those Darkers!"

"こんなところにもダーカーが！
ずいぶん派手な登場ね！"

"龍族に迷惑を
かけるわけにはいかない。
あのダーカーを倒さないと！"
